fulltext:
We are looking to hire a Google Cloud Sales Manager to join our strong (and growing) Cloud Transformation practice. This is a senior role, and one that will stretch you personally and professionally. Your role will be helping to consolidate the well-established relationship between Google and our organisation. Our ideal candidate is highly motivated, an excellent communicator, can work within a collaborative team but also on their own initiative.
The PA Cloud capability has experienced significant growth and we are continuing to invest heavily in this huge market opportunity. PA is an amazing company with incredible sector and technical capabilities which makes us unique in the market.
The right person will be able to utilise our incredibly talented people, customers and alliances and develop our cloud capability to meet the growing global cloud computing market. The right sales principal will be very successful in this role.
As the Google Cloud Sales Manager, you will be the face of our organisation to Google Cloud Platform Services, helping to drive sales, revenue and partnerships. You will be responsible for developing the Alliance strategy for our Google partnership as well as developing our cloud business and driving revenue by working with Marketing and Google directly. You’ll need a deep understanding of the existing Cloud marketplace, the part this plays in the wider Digital Transformation strategy of enterprise organisations; and where the pros and cons lie specifically with Google Cloud in relation to hybrid and multi-cloud best practices and transformation approaches.
You must be able to:

Provide confidence through your market credibility and comfortably speak with CIO-level clients to understand their specific opportunities, goals and barriers.
Be able to formulate and communicate compelling Google Cloud (hybrid and multi-cloud) propositions and solutions that can deliver tangible value to each target organisation, fast.
Deliver complex and simple sales opportunities (both new name and existing clients) from inception through conclusion to on-going client and stake-holder management

 
The ideal candidate compliments their business development and commercial acumen with accurate technical content to shape and sell complex technology-based Google Cloud transformation programmes in a dynamic consulting environment.
You have developed your experience in shaping, selling and delivering technology-based transformation projects and programmes, and have worked in a major consultancy, agency and/or in major industry players that have successfully carried out technology-based transformations.Commercial Domain Skills:

Demonstrate a proven track-record of selling successful, transformational programmes that have delivered tangible and lasting results to a number of enterprise organisations.
Especially in recent years, these will have included Cloud transformation and migration programmes, pure-play, hybrid and/or multi-Cloud.
Experience of ‘land and expand’ of new name wins and nurturing them into multi-million pound, established clients
Comfortable in carrying commercial revenue/sales targets and a track record of achieving them.
A solid understanding of the Cloud marketplace both commercially and technically

Technology Domain Skills:

Digital & Technology Strategy formulation, and ability to understand the implications of technology choices on business choices, and vice-versa 
Digital & Technology Data Architectures, including Cloud-based platforms and strategic Cloud-migration, connected devices, digital gateways, hyper-modularity, etc.
Orchestration of ecosystem players/solutions providing modular components to the end-2-end architecture
Big Data technologies and exploitation
Experience in "Connected Devices" and in the "Internet of Things" applications, and preferably in other emerging technologies (e.g. VR/AR, Blockchain, AI, Digital Twins, etc.)
Practical knowledge of digitally-enabled Service-Orientated Architecture and Processes (e.g. service design)

Business Domain Skills:

Complex Programme Management and Stakeholder Management
Effective communication skills, both bottom-up and top-down
Appreciates the bidirectional influences and dependencies between business and technology
Can shape and sell complex technology-based transformation programmes
Leader of Consulting Teams
Develops go-to-market offerings working in collaboration with existing functional and sector teams

Industry Experience:

An industry background in one of Finance, Consumer Goods, Retail, Manufacturing, with a strong network, would be an advantage.
A deep understanding of the most important dynamics in at least one of the B2C, B2B2C and B2B value chains is essential.
 We believe in the power of ingenuity to build a positive human future in a technology-driven world.
As strategies, technologies and innovation collide, we create opportunity from complexity.
Our diverse teams of experts combine innovative thinking and breakthrough use of technologies to progress further, faster. Our clients adapt and transform, and together we achieve enduring results.
An innovation and transformation consultancy, we are over 3,200 specialists in consumer, defence and security, energy and utilities, financial services, government, health and life sciences, manufacturing, and transport. Our people are strategists, innovators, designers, consultants, digital experts, scientists, engineers and technologists. We operate globally from offices across the UK, US, Europe, and the Nordics.
PA. Bringing Ingenuity to Life.

description.title: Diversity Statement
description.content:
We believe that diversity makes us a stronger firm and look to employ people with different ideas, styles and skillsets. This diversity stimulates a rich, creative environment – one in which our people develop, and our clients enjoy enduring results. We’re committed to recruiting, promoting and rewarding our people solely based on their ability to contribute to PA’s goals, without regard to their sex, race, disability, religion, national origin, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age or marital status.

We welcome international applications, but we are unable to offer sponsorship for work permits, so you will need to have the full right to live and work in the UK. Unfortunately, your application will be automatically rejected if you do not have these rights.
